result.title: Invitation to witness SnackDown Finale and compete in SnackDown Finale Mirror contest
result.content:
Hello Codeforces Community!

CodeChef invites you to witness the CodeChef SnackDown 2015 Finale, which will have top 50 teams from across the global battling out for the title of "SnackDown 2015 Champions".

Time: 27th June 2015 (1200 hrs) to 27th June 2015 (1700 hrs). (Indian Standard Time — +5:30 GMT) — Check your timezone.

Details: http://www.codechef.com/SNCK15FL

Registration: It is a team contest and the finalists are pre-registered for the contest.

  • Problem Setters : Cherrytree (Sergey Kulik) utkarshl (Utkarsh Lath) suh_ash2008 (Suhash Venkatesh), iscsi (Istvan Nagy) and I_lost_my_handle (Praveen Dhinwa)
  • Editorialist: kevinsogo (Kevin Atenzia)
  • Problem Tester: kevinsogo (Kevin Atenzia), utkarshl (Utkarsh Lath) suh_ash2008 (Suhash Venkatesh) and iscsi (Istvan Nagy)
  • Contest Admin: I_lost_my_handle (Praveen Dhinwa)
  • Russian Translator : Cherrytree (Sergey Kulik)
  • Mandarin Translator: gediiiiiii (Gedi Zheng)
  • Vietnamese Translator: khanhptnk (Khanh Xuan Nguyen)

Prizes:

For Indians:

1st prize: INR 3 lakhs + Job Offer with Directi, 2nd prize: INR 2 lakhs + Job Offer with Directi, 3rd prize: INR 1 lakhs + Job Offer with Directi

For Rest of the world:

1st prize: Mac book pro to the team members, 2nd prize: Drone quadcopters to the team members, 3rd prize: Go pro cameras to the team members

It promises to deliver on an interesting set of algorithmic problems with something for all. Also, we bring all the action from the onsite round on your screens. You can watch all the action live here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X_W2kOUrNbw starting from 4PM IST, 27th June (see your time zone here).

We are also conducting a parallel mirror contest of SnackDown Finale at: http://www.codechef.com/SD15FLMR.

Good Luck! Hope to see you participating!! Please don't forget to watch your favorite teams in action in onsite and online finals too !!
